content: other suitable yarns may be regia premium merino yak sock yarn 400m/100g kremke eco cashmere 112m/25g or other slightly bulkier 4ply/fingering weight yarns 2 5 mm 80 cm circular needle or whatever size needed to meet gauge - my gauge is quite loose so you may need larger needles 2x different clip-on stitch markers one for beginning of round one for halfway round enjoy 1 https //www nofrillsknitting co uk/blogs/news/free-pattern-the-shopkeepers-friend-mini-hot-water-bottle-cover 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hundred-stitch-snood 3 https //nofrillsknitting co uk/pages/contact
